:Feline::
She leaned agianst him. "It was when I was being held captive by the 
Allience." She put her arm around him and held him close. She cried 
on his shoulder.  "I was beaten so much of the time. Every time they 
looked at me and told me that I was beautiful, I would be hurt." She 
wept on his shoulder and couldn't stop. "It was a mirical that I 
escaped and made my way here.  Iron Raptor was nice enough to take me 
in with her group." she sobbed. "I..I'm sorry.  I try to be strong,  
but it still hurts. I'm sorry. I don't mean to trouble you with all 
this." she said in between sobs.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He felt sorry for her.
> "Oh, my..." He moved around the table, and sat next to her. He put 
his
> arm around her.
> "I ashure you, I wont." He kissed her cheek.
> "So who was it, and how long ago?"
